name: Butter and Fly
description:
You have to go in fullscreen to play the game well!

Description:

Ever wanted to relive your carefree childhood?

Now you can!

Play as Butter and Fly who enjoy their youth catching all sorts of butterflies.

But this game offers more than just catching normal butterflies.

There are far more rare butterflies. Are you the one who will catch 'em all?

Controls:

Grab yourself a friend to play this game with, or don't and challenge yourself by controlling both players at once.

The keys for the movement of each character are WASD and the NUM keys 8456. Have fun!
